name: QUASAR
tagline: QA Tolerances, are they tight enough?
body:
#Info
This page could be used for distributing the project once complete?
Currently all code is public with the free account.
---

**Pros**
* Simple editor
* link to code easily
    * would like a standalone program
* Easy to maintain
    * No overheads

It would probably be a good idea to setup a new account for anything released to set a different username, rather than *mbolt01*

Link to main <http://www.uk-dan.co.uk> site as the main point of reference?

M. Bolt
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
